description.value: Your additives contain panaceas that can remedy a plethora of maladies. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Merciful Elixir], your elixir can instead attempt to counteract the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed] condition.
